author: Lorianne Ard
title: 9 Amazing Ryzen RAM For 2023 | Robots.net
text: If you're on the lookout for the perfect Ryzen RAM to enhance your system's performance, look no further than these 9 amazing options for 2023. With the rapid advancements in technology, investing in the right RAM can significantly impact your computer's speed and efficiency. Whether you're a gamer, a content creator, or simply someone who demands a smooth and seamless computing experience, having the best Ryzen RAM is essential. In this article, we will delve into the top 9 options that are poised to dominate the market in 2023, providing you with an unparalleled computing experience. Overall Score: 9/10 The KINGDEL K15 [Mini PC](https://robots.net/tech-reviews/11-best-mini-pc-for-2023/) is a powerful and compact computer that delivers top-notch performance. Equipped with an AMD Ryzen 9 5900HX processor and 64GB [DDR4 RAM](https://robots.net/tech/what-is-a-ddr4-ram/), this mini PC is built for speed and multitasking. It also features a 2TB [SSD](https://robots.net/tech/what-is-a-ssd/) for ample storage space. With its AMD Radeon graphics, the K15 Mini PC is capable of handling gaming and graphic-intensive tasks. It comes with [Windows 11](https://robots.net/tech-reviews/pc-tech-reviews/windows-11-is-here-everything-you-need-to-know/) Pro pre-installed, allowing for a seamless user experience. The mini PC has a variety of connectors, including USB 3.2, Display Port, HD, and Type-C, for easy connectivity. With support for WOL and PXE, as well as automatic restart after power loss, this mini PC offers convenience and reliability. The sleek and compact design makes it perfect for use in small spaces. Overall, the KINGDEL K15 Mini PC is a high-performance computer that offers great value for its price. Key Features - AMD Ryzen 9 5900HX Processor - 64GB DDR4 RAM, 2TB [M.2 SSD](https://robots.net/tech/9-best-m-2-ssd-for-2023/) - AMD Radeon Graphics, 2100 MHz Graphics Frequency - Multiple connectors for easy connectivity - Supports WOL, PXE, and automatic restart Specifications - Color: Black - Dimension: 5.87Lx5.75Wx1.57H - Size: [64GB Ram](https://robots.net/tech-reviews/10-best-64gb-ram-for-2023/)2tb ssd Pros - Powerful processor and ample RAM - Large storage capacity - Supports gaming and graphic-intensive tasks - Pre-installed with Windows 11 Pro - Convenient connectors for easy connectivity - Supports WOL, PXE, and automatic restart Cons - Fan can be noisy under load - Integrated Wi Fi could be better The KINGDEL K15 Mini PC is a compact and powerful computer that offers impressive performance. With its AMD Ryzen 9 5900HX processor and 64GB DDR4 RAM, it can handle demanding tasks with ease. The [2TB SSD](https://robots.net/tech/8-best-2tb-ssd-for-2023/) provides ample storage space, and the AMD Radeon graphics ensure smooth gaming and graphics performance. The mini PC comes pre-installed with Windows 11 Pro, offering a seamless and user-friendly experience. The variety of connectors allows for easy connectivity with external devices. While the fan can be a bit noisy under load and the integrated [WiFi](https://robots.net/tech-reviews/11-amazing-wifi-for-2023/) could be improved, these minor drawbacks are outweighed by the overall performance and value of this mini PC. Whether for work or play, the KINGDEL K15 Mini PC is a great choice. Overall Score: 8/10 The HP Pavilion Tower Desktop is an impressive computer with high-end specifications, making it suitable for both work and entertainment purposes. It features an AMD Ryzen 5 5600G processor and 64GB of DDR4 RAM, ensuring smooth multitasking and effortless performance. The 2TB PCIe NVMe M.2 [Solid State Drive](https://robots.net/tech/8-amazing-solid-state-drive-for-2023/) provides ample storage space and fast data transfer speeds. With Windows 11 Home as its operating system, users can enjoy a beautiful interface, improved performance features, and compatibility with [Android](https://robots.net/tech-reviews/8-best-android-for-2023/) apps. This bundle also includes a wired [keyboard](https://robots.net/tech/what-is-a-keyboard/), mouse, and a KKE Mousepad. The PC supports Wi-Fi 6 and [Bluetooth](https://robots.net/tech/what-is-bluetooth/) connectivity, allowing for seamless wireless connections. Overall, the HP Pavilion Tower Desktop offers a reliable and powerful computing experience. With its powerful AMD Ryzen processor and ample RAM and storage, it can handle demanding tasks with ease. The inclusion of Windows 11 enhances the user experience, providing a more modern and streamlined interface. While the absence of a CD/DVD drive may be a downside for some, it aligns with the current trend of digital media consumption. The keyboard and mouse could be improved in terms of comfort and usability. Overall, the HP Pavilion Tower Desktop offers excellent value for its price, making it a great choice for users in need of a powerful and versatile desktop computer. Overall Score: 7/10 The HP 14" HD Touchscreen Laptop is a reliable and affordable option for those in need of a new laptop. It features a 14" HD touchscreen display, AMD Ryzen 3 5300U processor, and 8GB RAM with a [512GB SSD](https://robots.net/tech/14-best-512gb-ssd-for-2023/). It runs on Windows 11 Home and offers a range of ports for connectivity. The laptop has a sleek black design and comes with a 3-cell 41WHr lithium-ion battery. While some customers have experienced issues with freezing and software, others have found it to be a great budget-friendly option. With a customer rating of 3.9/5, this HP laptop offers good performance and value for money. While there have been some reports of freezing and software issues, these do not seem to be widespread. The laptop has a sleek black design and a range of ports for connectivity. It also offers fast boot-up speed and a reliable battery life. If you’re looking for an affordable option for everyday use, this HP laptop is definitely worth considering. However, the laptop has received mixed reviews, with some customers experiencing issues like battery discharge and noise. Despite these drawbacks, the laptop provides good value for its price, making it a worthwhile choice for those looking for a powerful [gaming laptop](https://robots.net/tech/14-best-gaming-laptop-for-2023/) with a budget-friendly price tag. Overall Score: 8/10 The [Dell](https://robots.net/tech/what-is-the-dell/) 2023 Newest Inspiron 14 Laptop is a powerful and versatile laptop designed for productivity and entertainment. With an AMD Ryzen 7 processor, 32GB RAM, and a [1TB SSD](https://robots.net/tech/13-best-1tb-ssd-for-2023/), it provides exceptional speed and performance. The laptop comes with Windows 11 Pro, offering enhanced features and improved connectivity options. It also features Wi-Fi 6 technology for fast and reliable internet connection. With its sleek design and pebble green color, the Dell 2023 Newest Inspiron 14 Laptop is a stylish and reliable option for users seeking a high-performance laptop. The FHD+ display and AMD Radeon Graphics provide stunning visuals and immersive gaming experiences. While the laptop excels in performance, its customer service support may be lacking, which is something to consider. Overall, the Dell 2023 Newest Inspiron 14 Laptop is a stylish and reliable option for users looking for a high-performance laptop. With upgraded memory and storage, including 32GB DDR4 RAM and a 1TB PCIe [NVMe M.2 SSD](https://robots.net/tech/10-best-nvme-m-2-ssd-for-2023/), you can easily switch between applications and enjoy fast boot-up and data transfer speeds. It is equipped with the high-performance AMD Octa-Core Ryzen 7 5700G processor and 32GB RAM, providing fast and efficient multitasking capabilities. It is designed to provide an immersive gaming experience with its powerful processor and graphics card. However, users should be cautious of potential heating issues and the limited upgradability of the system. Overall, it is a great choice for gamers who value performance and aesthetics. Ryzen RAM Buyer's Guide Are you planning to build an impressive Ryzen-powered PC but feeling overwhelmed by the choices when it comes to RAM? Worry not! This buyer's guide is here to provide you with all the information you need to make the best decision. Whether you're a tech enthusiast or a gaming aficionado, selecting the right RAM for your Ryzen processor is crucial. So let's dive right in and explore the wonderful world of Ryzen RAM options! Factors to Consider When selecting a RAM for your Ryzen processor, it's important to keep several key factors in mind: - Speed: Ryzen processors are known to perform optimally with higher-speed RAM modules. Consider going for at least DDR4-3200 or even higher if you desire top-notch performance. Increased [RAM speed](https://robots.net/tech/how-do-i-know-my-ram-speed/)helps improve overall system responsiveness and enhances multitasking capabilities. - Capacity: The amount of RAM you require largely depends on your usage patterns. For casual gaming and everyday tasks, 16GB should suffice. However, if you delve into resource-intensive tasks like video editing or 3D rendering, consider opting for 32GB or higher for a smoother experience. - Compatibility: It's crucial to ensure that your chosen RAM module is compatible with your [motherboard](https://robots.net/tech/what-is-the-motherboard/). Before making a purchase, consult the manufacturer's website or user manual to verify compatibility. Additionally, double-check the number of [RAM slots](https://robots.net/tech/how-many-ram-slots/)on your motherboard to determine whether you prefer a single stick or a dual-channel memory configuration. - Latency and Timings: Though often overlooked, RAM latency and timings play a vital role in system performance. Lower latency leads to faster data retrieval, resulting in improved overall responsiveness. Look for RAM modules with low CAS latency (CL) values for optimal performance. - Budget: Determine your budget beforehand. [RAM module](https://robots.net/tech/what-does-a-ram-module-look-like/)prices can vary significantly depending on capacity, speed, and brand. Be sure to strike a balance between performance and affordability. Types of Ryzen RAM The market offers a variety of RAM options suitable for Ryzen processors. Understand the different types available to make an informed decision: - Single Rank vs. Dual Rank: Dual-rank memory modules provide more performance potential due to their higher density and better data interleaving. They can enhance multitasking capabilities, making them an excellent choice for power users. - XMP Profiles: Many modern RAM modules come with eXtreme Memory Profile (XMP) support. XMP profiles allow you to overclock your RAM to higher frequencies without manually adjusting timings. This feature can make the overclocking process significantly easier for overclocking enthusiasts. - RGB and Aesthetics: If you're someone who loves a visually stunning setup, consider opting for RAM modules with RGB lighting. Many manufacturers offer RAM with customizable RGB lighting, allowing you to create a vibrant and personalized system. - Heat Spreader: RAM modules often come with heat spreaders or heatsinks to dissipate heat and improve thermal performance. While they are not essential for all users, they can be beneficial if you're planning to push your Ryzen processor to its limits. Frequently Asked Questions about 9 Amazing Ryzen RAM For 2023 Yes, Ryzen processors are compatible with DDR4 memory. However, ensure that the RAM module you choose is compatible with your motherboard to avoid any compatibility issues. Ryzen processors benefit from higher RAM speeds due to their architecture. Opting for at least DDR4-3200 or higher can help improve overall system performance, specifically in tasks that are memory-intensive. Both RAM capacity and speed are important factors. If your usage mainly involves everyday tasks and casual gaming, 16GB of faster RAM should be sufficient. However, for resource-intensive tasks like video editing or heavy multitasking, more RAM capacity, accompanied by higher speeds, can greatly enhance performance. CAS latency refers to the time it takes for the RAM to access a specific column of data. Lower CAS latency values indicate faster data retrieval, resulting in better overall system performance. Mixing RAM brands and capacities is possible but not recommended. It can lead to compatibility issues and may not utilize the full potential of your system. It is best to use identical RAM modules from the same brand for optimal performance.

author: CNN
title: Chinese chess champion forfeits victory over ‘bad behavior’ after tournament but denies cheating
text:
A champion of the board game Xiangqi, also known as Chinese chess, has had to forfeit his title because of “bad behavior” after winning a tournament, but has denied allegations online and in Chinese state media that he used a sex toy to cheat.
Yan Chenglong, a 48-year-old amateur from China’s central Henan province, was victorious at the finals of the Chess King tournament in the island province of Hainan on December 17, winning 100,000 yuan (about Ksh.2.2 million), according to state-run tabloid Global Times.
He had to forfeit the prize money, along with his victory, following an investigation by the Chinese Xiangqi Association (CXA) into “bad behavior” at his hotel after the tournament, the group said in a statement Monday.
The association said Yan had defecated in the bathtub of his hotel and vandalized furniture in his room after a few drinks.
It said Yan had “violated public order and good morals,” and he would be suspended from all Xiangqi tournaments for a year.
In the aftermath of the tournament, allegations swirled on China’s tightly controlled social media that Yan may have cheated using a vibrating sex toy to communicate with others, an accusation that multiple Chinese state media outlets then covered.
But Yan has forcefully denied those allegations.
In an interview with state-run magazine China Newsweek, Yan said he lodged a protest against the association’s decision to penalize him for the hotel incident.
He also vowed to take legal action against what he called “slanderous comments” made by online bloggers.
In its statement announcing that Yan had been stripped of his win, the CXA said it was “unable to conclude from the information at hand” whether Yan had used a sex toy to cheat “as speculated by the media.”
In his interview with China Newsweek, Yan did say that he had felt “unwell” after the tournament and that he tried to clean up the bathtub, but left in a hurry to catch a flight.
“I apologize to the entire society for my bad behavior,” he said in the phone interview. CNN was not able to reach Yan for comment.
According to the Global Times, Yan previously won the men’s championship in an open tournament at China’s 2021 National Games, and has been playing for several decades.
Competitors all over the country from “grassroot backgrounds” gathered in Hainan earlier this month to take part in the tournament, according to the CXA’s official WeChat account. Xiangqi is hugely popular across the country and among Chinese diaspora.
It’s not the first time accusations of cheating with sex toys have been leveled in the high-stakes world of competitive board games.
The news of Yan’s suspension broke just days after the conclusion of an investigation into another cheating scandal, involving five-time world chess champion Magnus Carlsen and US grandmaster Hans Niemann.
Carlsen accused his opponent Niemann of cheating after Niemann won the 2022 Sinquefield Cup in St. Louis.
Although Carlsen did not provide details about what he alleged Niemann did during their over-the-board match, social media was rife with accusations of Niemann using vibrating sex toys to receive signals to instruct him as to which moves to make.
Niemann “categorically” denied these allegations. The sport’s world governing body finally concluded on December 15 that while Niemann didn’t cheat against Carlsen in their over-the-board match, he did cheat in up to 55 online games.
Tags: China Chinese Chess Xiangqi Yan Chenglong Want to send us a story? Submit on Wananchi Reporting on the Citizen Digital App or Send an email to wananchi@royalmedia.co.ke or Send an SMS to 25170 or WhatsApp on 0743570000

author: Favour Adegoke
title: Lizzo Finally Shares Secret To How She Lost 16% Of Her Body Fat
text:
Lizzo has finally shared details of how she achieved her massive drop in the scales after shutting down ozempic allegations.
During a chat with fans, the singer also shared that working on her anxiety brought her to a healthier place, adding that she began feeling “lighter, energetically and emotionally.”
Lizzo’s remarks come after she was called a “sell-out” for her incredible weight loss despite spreading the message that “bigger is beautiful.”
Article continues below advertisement
Lizzo Opens Up About Losing 16% Body Fat Xavier Collin/Image Press Agency/MEGA The “About Damn Time” rapper took to her TikTok Livestream and told fans that she had to cut out Starbucks and followed up with adopting a calorie deficit for her intake, to achieve her weight loss.
Emphasizing the advantage calorie deficit played in attaining her goal weight, Lizzo, born Melissa Viviane Jefferson, shared that she was unaware that the “two to three” Starbucks drinks she took were adding about 1200 calories to her daily intake.
Article continues below advertisement
She noted that the only thing that worked for her “across the board, science-wise, is calories in versus calories out” before adding that she also cut out coffee altogether and started eating “super savory” food as opposed to “sugary stuff.”
“Everybody’s body is different. Find out what works for you,” Lizzo said during the livestream, insisting that counting calories is a good tool to fight against the American food system.”
Article continues below advertisement
The Singer Had To Work On Her Mental Health Elsewhere in her livestream, Lizzo alluded to working on her mental health, as it was instrumental in bringing her to a healthier place.
The 36-year-old rapper explained that she focused on gaining control of her anxiety, which made her feel “lighter, energetically and emotionally.”
“I’ve been working to get my anxiety under control for years,” she said, per the New York Post . “And then I decided that I want to release and I’m ready to stop waiting to be myself like fully and be happy.”
“And I meditated. I calmed myself down. And I isolated a little bit, but not like made myself lonely, not the way I used to when I was depressed. I isolated myself in a mindful way where I had no distractions,” Lizzo continued.
Article continues below advertisement
“I loved to distract myself with people,” she continued. “I loved to distract myself with food. I loved to distract myself with drinking. I loved to distract myself with problems that I would create. I would love to do that. And I stopped doing that.”
After the livestream, the “Truth Hurts” singer showed off a video of what she eats in a TikTok post. The video featured a bowl of jerk bison balls, rice, peas, and cabbage.
“I’m gonna pour some hot sauce on this and go to town,” Lizzo said.
Article continues below advertisement
Lizzo Slams Ozempic Allegations OConnor-Arroyo / AFF-USA.com / MEGA Lizzo’s massive weight loss has not come without its fair share of controversy, as fans accused her of turning to the celebrity miracle drug Ozempic.
Lizzo distanced herself from the allegations, insisting that she had undertaken a “methodical” approach to shedding the pounds, including “months of weight training” and “living in a calorie deficit thanks to a high-protein, veggie-based diet.”
In September last year, she also joked about the Ozempic allegations on her Instagram page.
Lizzo wrote: “When you finally get Ozempic allegations after 5 months of weight training and calorie deficit.”
Is The Singer’s Weight Loss Journey Linked To Her Legal Woes? LISA OConnor/AFF-USA.com / MEGA The rapper, who was a vocal advocate of body positivity, has been accused of slimming down to distance herself from the darkest chapter of her career.
“By getting skinny and redefining who she is, even the way she acts and dresses, she feels like she is now emerging as this new person and that the drama of her past won’t follow her,” a source told the Daily Mail .
The singer has been plagued by a series of lawsuits she faced in 2023 after four of her former employees accused her of sexual, racial, and religious harassment and creating a hostile work environment in two separate cases.
According to the news outlet, the insider alleged that Lizzo’s quest to lose weight is part of her effort to rehabilitate her image by changing it completely.
Article continues below advertisement
“She has pushed people who love her away and she is now solely focused on becoming a beautiful Black Barbie,” the source shared. “She wants to be Beyoncé.”
“She has done everything that she can to identify as far away from the Lizzo that was accused of doing those inappropriate acts,” they added.
Lizzo Was Branded A ‘Sell-Out’ Over Her Weight Loss MEGA Lizzo’s decision to lose weight has reportedly rubbed some people the wrong way, given her long-standing reputation as a body positivity advocate.
“She spent her whole career talking about how big is beautiful and telling women to be proud of their bodies,” the source told the Daily Mail . “To those who knew her for a long time, all she is doing is becoming exactly what she spent the past decade saying she would never be.”
The insider added that many now view Lizzo as a “sell-out” and warned that the singer should expect some backlash in the future.
They said, “She sold out and became what she thought the industry needs her to be instead of being herself. This will have consequences.”
